word: In such cases my advice would be, Mothers, whatever trials you may be called to endure through poverty, through wounds and bruises of the soul, from the harsh, overbearing assumption of the husband and father, do not leave your children; do not give them up to the influence of a godless father.  Your work is to counteract the work of the father, who is apparently under the control of Satan.--Letter 28, 1890.
